intro: Transform your look with our expert hair care, styling, and beauty services. All prices listed are starting prices and may vary depending on your hair length, texture, and condition.
disclaimer: Please Note: All prices shown are starting prices. Final pricing depends on your hair length, hair type, and hair condition. Consultation recommended for accurate pricing

categories.title: Hair Care Services
categories.subtitle: Transform your look with our expert hair care and styling services.

services.title: Silk Press
services.description:
$150.00
Silk press is a hair service that includes cleansing, conditioning, pressing, and styling, with trims also provided. It usually takes around 1 hour and 30 minutes to complete, and the cost is  starts  from $150

services.title: Shampooing Only
services.description:
$50
Hair is washed clean and conditioned.

services.title: Deep Condition Only
services.description:
$70 
Our Deep Condition Only service offers a rejuvenating treatment for your hair, leaving it nourished and shiny. With prices customized to suit your hair type and length, you can enjoy the benefits of a deep condition without the need for additional styling.

services.title: Trim
services.description:
$30 
Our trim service provides precise and meticulous trimming of hair or other materials to achieve the desired length or shape, ensuring a clean and polished look. With our skilled experts, you can expect accurate trim results that enhance your style and appearance.

services.title: Relaxing Hair, Deep Condition and Trim
services.description:
$200 and up
Relaxing hair, deep condition, and trim service includes the use of high-quality products for retouching, deep conditioning, and trimming the hair. These professional products ensure a thorough and effective treatment, leaving your hair refreshed, nourished, and beautifully styled. Please note that the price varies depending on the hair type, lengths and growth.

services.title: Perm/Curly Kit
services.description:
$250 and up
The Perm/Curly kit service provides a lasting solution for beautiful curls, whether your hair is naturally straight or kinky. With results that can last 3 to 5 months, this service includes a deep conditioning treatment, a trim, and pricing tailored to the length of your hair. Contact us for a consultation to see if this service is right for you and promote healthy hair growth.

services.title: Consultation
services.description:
$20
Comprehensive consultation to understand your hair needs, pricing, and recommended treatments.

categories.title: Dreadlocks & Loc Services
categories.styled_description: Professional loc services including maintenance, retwists, and styling.

services.title: Traditional locs retwist/retighten
services.description:
$200.00 and up
Our skilled professionals offer a personalized consultation for our Traditional locs retwist/retighten service, ensuring that your locs are refreshed and maintained to perfection. With prices starting at $200, the cost may vary depending on hair length and type, and please note that wash service is not included.

services.title: Traditional locs instal
services.description:
$350 and up
Get the traditional locs installation you desire with a personalized one-on-one consultation to determine the price based on your hair length and type, starting at $350. Please note that the wash service is not included.

services.title: Sisterlocs/microlocs retwist/retighten
services.description:
$200 and up
The Sisterlocs/Microlocs retwist/retighten service focuses on maintaining and revitalizing your locs, particularly for regrowth every six weeks. A consultation is necessary for new clients to assess hair condition, with prices starting at $200, which includes shampooing; additional fees apply for significant regrowth beyond the six-week period, and styling services are not included.

services.title: Sisterlocs install
services.description:
$900 and up
Our sisterlocs installation service offers a personalized consultation to determine the price based on hair length and density, with a starting rate of $900 for hair up to 4 inches in length. Each additional inch incurs a $50 fee, ensuring a custom pricing structure that caters to your unique hair needs. While the service package does not include a free hair shampooing, we gladly offer a shampooing service using the appropriate products to enhance your experience.

services.title: Temporary Locs installation
services.description:
$300 and up
Get temporary locs installed by our expert stylists at affordable prices starting at $300 for medium-sized locs. Book a consultation to determine the final cost based on your hair length and density. Plus, enjoy a complimentary hair shampooing with our service package.

services.title: Locs styling
services.description:
$30.00 and up
Locs styling services begin at $20 for sisterlocs and microlocs, and $30 for dreadlocs, and up. We offer great techniques to ensure your locs are beautifully styled and maintained, catering to your individual preferences and hair type.

services.title: Permanent Loc Extension Instant Installation
services.description:
$800.00
Our prices are starting prices and may vary.
This service includes instant loc extension installation for permanent dreadlocks. Once installed, they are not meant to be taken down.

categories.title: Hair Color Services
categories.subtitle: Enhance your style with vibrant color transformations.

services.title: Color consultation/strand test
services.description:
Free
A color consultation helps because the hairstylist gets to see and understand the hair condition before the service, and being able to give a satisfying result.
unless it is black color, any other color needs consultation before actual application

services.title: Black Color
services.description:
$150 and up
Is the process of using a dye or tint to change the color of your hair to cover up the grey, or for cosmetic purposes. This service includes deep conditioning, blow drying and styling the hair after wash.

services.title: Full Highlight and Color
services.description:
$100 and up
An all over foil high lights and one tone demi, semi, or permanent color.
The service fee is $100 per application. The service includes blow drying and styling the hair after wash.
Unless it is black color, any other color services needs consultation before the actual application

services.title: Partial Highlight and Color
services.description:
$100 and up
Partial highlights covering approximately 1/2 of the head and all over permanent or semi permanent color of a client's choice.
The fee is per application.
Unless it is black color, any other color service needs consultation before the actual application

categories.title: Blowout Services
categories.subtitle: Smooth, shiny, and voluminous hair styles for any occasion.

services.title: Thorough Blowout
services.description:
$100 and up
The hair is deep conditioned, and thoroughly blown out to a desired style leaving the hair shiny and glossy.

services.title: Basic Blowout and Curls
services.description:
$100 and up
The hair is deep conditioned, and blown out and then curled to a desired style using a curling iron.

categories.title: Wig Services
categories.subtitle: Custom creations, revamps, and flawless installations.

services.title: Wig Revamp
services.description:
$120 and up
An already worn wig is washed, deep conditioned, and styled. I request my clients to give me a 3 days interval time to work on the wig.

services.title: Custom Made Frontal Wig (no install)
services.description:
$180 and up
You must provide your own hair.
Custom Made Wig using Frontal and Bundles. This service requires an HD or Transparent Lace.
Install is included.
You must bring hair 3 days before your pick up time.

services.title: Custom Made Closure Wig (no install)
services.description:
$200 and up
You must provide your own hair.
Custom Made Wig using Frontal and Bundles. This service requires an HD or Transparent Lace.
Install is included.
You must bring hair 3 days before your pick up time.

services.title: Lace Frontal Wig Install
services.description:
$280 and up
Your hair is cornrowed. Wig sewed down along the sides/back and the front is secured with adhesive
(if wanted) or with an elastic band.
This service requires an HD or Transparent lace wig.
Deep conditioning is included in this service.

services.title: Lace Closure Wig Install
services.description:
$200 and up
Your hair is cornrowed. Wig sewed down along the sides/back and the front is secured with adhesive
(if wanted) or with an elastic band.
This service requires an HD or Transparent lace wig.
Deep conditioning is included in this service.

services.title: Custom Made Frontal Wig + Install
services.description:
$350 and up
You must provide your own hair.
Custom Made Wig using Frontal and Bundles. This service requires an HD or Transparent Lace.
Install is included.
You must bring hair 3 days before your appointment, the appointment time you schedule is for the actual install.
Your hair is deep conditioned and cornrowed before wig install.

services.title: Custom Made Closure Wig + Install
services.description:
$400 and up
You must provide your own hair.
Custom Made Wig using Frontal and Bundles. This service requires an HD or Transparent Lace.
Install is included.
You must bring hair 3 days before your appointment, the appointment time you schedule is for the actual install.
Your hair is deep condoned and cornrowed before wig install.

services.title: Wig or Lace Dropping/Picking
services.description: Book for the time you are available to drop or pick up the wig once it's been revamped. Please note, i request clients to give me an interval of 3 days on a wig so that I have enough time to work on it properly within my other appointments. A full payment is to be made for the wigs during droppings.

categories.title: Microlinks Services
categories.subtitle: Seamless extensions that blend perfectly with your natural hair.

services.title: Microlink Consultation
services.description:
$40
A 20mins consultation is required at a $40, which is different from the service fee.
This is to help you understand the service, the right extension to buy plus where to buy the good type of extension that matches your hair texture, and what are the advantages of the hairstyle.

services.title: Microlink Extension Removal
services.description:
$100 and up
The process includes a wash, deep condition and blowout.
Deep conditioning is included in the service.

services.title: Microlink Installation
services.description:
$500 and up
Hair has to be heathy around the perimeter and long enough to cover the installed extensions.
The charge on the service is a starting price, for only labor, for 2 bundles of I-tip. You provide your extensions.
Additional bundles can be added on to hair as per client request for extra fullness for $50 each. Styling is not included in the service.
Deep conditioning is included in this service.

services.title: Microlink Maintenance
services.description:
$100 and up
Microlinks maintenance involves assessing the current condition and growth of your Microlinks to determine the necessary upkeep. The starting price listed is just an estimate, so please remember to discuss the actual cost based on the specific work required on your Microlinks.

categories.title: Braiding Services
categories.subtitle: Protective and stylish braids for all ages and preferences.

services.title: Braided Hair Undo
services.description:
$60 and up
This service includes undoing of braided hair only.
Deep conditioning is included in this service.

services.title: Crotchet Braids
services.description:
$200 and up
Prices for crotchet braid extensions vary based on the presence of loops and the desired style, with costs starting at $200. Ensure an ample supply of extensions to achieve the desired look, prioritizing having more rather than fewer pieces.
Wash or extensions is not included in the price

services.title: Bohemian Box Braids
services.description:
$250 and up
Bohemian Box Braids offer a stylish twist on classic box braids, featuring loose and curly ends for added volume and a fuller appearance. With various styling options available, clients can customize their look to suit their preferences. Pricing starts at $250 and does not include extensions or shampooing services.

services.title: Twist Out
services.description:
$200 and up
Single-strand or two-strand Bantu knots or flat twists are placed all throughout damp hair. Giving hair enough time to dry is important when creating this style. Price and duration depends on the size and length of hair. Deep conditioning is included in the service.

services.title: Adult Cornrows
services.description:
$80 and up
Adult cornrows services provide a range of styles in various sizes and lengths, with the option to incorporate extensions for added flair. Starting at $80, the price varies based on the chosen style and length; please note that two packs of hair extensions are included, but shampooing is not part of the service.

services.title: Kids Cornrows and Braids
services.description:
$120 and up
Kids Cornrows and Braids provides a diverse selection of cornrow and braid styles in various sizes and lengths, starting at $120 and tailored to your child's preferences. Our services include both simple designs and intricate styles, with options for extensions available at an additional cost, while please note that washing services is NOT included, but 2 packs of hair extensions is included

services.title: Box Braids
services.description:
$180 and up
Our Box braids service offers a variety of sizes and lengths to choose from, with prices starting at $180. Please note that the price may vary depending on the length and size you choose, and that a wash or extensions is not included in the service.

services.title: Faux Locs
services.description:
$250 and up
Faux locs are a versatile and stylish protective hairstyle that mimics the appearance of traditional dreadlocks without the commitment. Please note that our prices are starting price.
Deep conditioning is not included on the service and we do not provide extensions for this services.

categories.title: Weaving Services
categories.description: Beautiful weave installations and styling tailored to your look.

services.title: Weave hair undo
services.description:
$60 and up
This is to be done in person.

services.title: frontal quick weave
services.description:
$200 and up
Frontal will be sewed down to the sides and back and adhered at the front (if wanted) or secured using an elastic band. Wefts in the back will be applied using bonding glue.
Deep conditioning is included in this Service.

services.title: closure quick weave
services.description:
$250.00
closure will be sewed down to the sides and back and adhered at the front (if wanted). wefts in the back will be applied using bonding glue.
Deep conditioning is included in this Service.

services.title: Leave out quick weave
services.description:
$250.00 and up
Deep conditioning is included in this service.
Then, a clients hair is either braided down and protected from all glue with the help of wrapping papers and stocking cap or the hair is held up using protective glue. a bob cut is included.

categories.title: Sew-in Services
categories.description: Neat, long-lasting sew-ins for versatile and beautiful hairstyles.

services.title: Traditional sew-in
services.description:
$200
The hair extension is fully installed so all natural hair is covered using the extension without closure or frontal. Deep conditioning is included in this service.

services.title: Sew-in consultation
services.description:
$20.00
this is done in person.

services.title: Pixie short bob cut sew-in
services.description:
$300.00 and up
The Pixie short bob cut sew-in service features a stylish, seamless quick weave or regular sewin that requires no leave out, lace closure, or frontal, ensuring a sleek and polished look. Additionally, a deep conditioning treatment is included to enhance the health and shine of your hair, leaving you with a vibrant and fresh finish. Hair extension is not included in the service.

services.title: lace closure sew-in
services.description:
$250 and up
you must provide your own hair. the process requires a HD or transparent lace closure and 3 bundles of hair. the natural hair is braided down and the closure is sewed at the back and sides and the front is secured using an elastic band or adhesive, as a client chooses.
any extra bundle is +$25.00 each.
Deep conditioning is included in this Service.

services.title: invisible sew-in
services.description:
$300.00 and up
all hair braided down with a clear parting, and the bundles are sewed on with the parting remaining visible. two to three bundles of hair are required for this process.
any extra bundle will be a +$25.00 each.
Deep conditioning is included in this Service.

categories.title: Massage Services
categories.description: Relax and unwind with soothing massage treatments tailored to your needs.

services.title: Swedish Massage
services.description: age: This classic massage technique uses long, flowing strokes to promote relaxation, improve circulation, and alleviate muscle tension.

services.title: Deep tissue massage
services.description: Ideal for targeting chronic muscle tension, this massage involves applying firm pressure to release knots and adhesions in deeper layers of muscle and connective tissues.

services.title: Chair massage
services.description: A convenient and shorter massage performed while seated in a specially designed chair, focusing on relieving tension in the neck, shoulders, back, and arms.

categories.title: Bridal Services
categories.description: Perfect bridal styling for your special day, including trials and touch-ups.

services.title: Bridal consultation
services.description: Pre-wedding consultation to discuss bridal style, accessories, and timeline.

services.title: Brides hair
services.description: This service offers professional hairstyling for brides, with prices based on the desired style chosen. If the service is required at the wedding venue, there may be an additional charge. To ensure a punctual appointment, it is recommended for the bride to allocate sufficient time.

services.title: Bridesmaids hair
services.description: Our Bridesmaids hair service offers customized hairstyling options to perfectly match each bridesmaid's desired look. With flexible pricing options that cater to individual preferences, every bridesmaid can achieve their dream hairstyle on the wedding day

categories.title: Other Services
categories.description: Additional beauty and care services to complete your look.

services.title: Shampoo only
services.description: Deep shampooing and conditioning for a clean, refreshed scalp.

services.title: Trim only
services.description: Hair trimming to remove split ends and promote healthy growth.

services.title: Consultation (any service)
services.description: Discuss your style goals, hair type, and service options with an expert stylist.
